IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE QUALITY COMPASSIONATE BEHAVIORAL HEALTHCARE SERVICES TO CHILDREN AND FAMILIES OF ARKANSAS THROUGH A COMPREHENSIVE CONTINUUM OF PROGRAMS WHICH INCLUDE RESIDENTIAL TREATMENT CENTER CARE, THERAPEUTIC GROUP HOME CARE, EMERGENCY SHELTER SERVICES, THERAPEUTIC DAY TREATMENT SCHOOLS, SCHOOL-BASED COUNSELING SERVICES, ARKANSAS CARES AND EARLY CHILDHOOD DEVELOPMENT.
IRS990.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO PROVIDE THERAPY, HOUSING, FOOD, AND CLOTHING FOR CHILDREN AND FAMILIES OF ARKANSAS. ALL PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENDITURES WENT TOWARD THIS PURPOSE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AUTHORITATIVE GUIDANCE HAS BEEN ISSUED THAT CREATES A SINGLE MODEL TO ADDRESS UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAX POSITIONS AND CLARIFIES THE ACCOUNTING FOR INCOME TAXES BY PRESCRIBING THE MINIMUM RECOGNITION THRESHOLD A TAX POSITION IS REQUIRED TO MEET BEFORE BEING RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. MANAGEMENT ANNUALLY REVIEWS ITS TAX POSITIONS AND HAS DETERMINED THAT THERE ARE NO MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT REQUIRE RECOGNITION IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AS OF JUNE 30, 2023 AND 2022.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: METHODIST FAMILY HEALTH, AN AFFILIATE, PROVIDES MANAGEMENT SERVICES TO UNITED METHODIST CHILDRENS HOME.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FEDERAL FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE CFO BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD MEMBERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES RECEIVE AN ANNUAL QUESTIONNAIRE THAT ASKS THEM TO DISCLOSE ANY CONFLICTS OF INTEREST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HUMAN RESOURCE DEPARTMENT COMPARES SALARY AND THE FINANCE COMMITTEE REVIEWS AND APPROVES SALARY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
